channel.title: What do you like to do in a server?
channel.description: When your playing an RSPS, whats your favorite thing to do? Skill, PvP, PvM, specific would be nice, I need to get a general idea of what kinda content I need to add.. I'm out of ideas..

item.title: What do you like to do in a server?
item.dc:creator: @best_shit_out best shit out
item.description:
@best_shit_out wrote:

In my opinion, slayer tasks always keep players busy! Adding a SlayerPoint Shop would be great, i always loved a server with that. Motivates me allot!

Read full topic

item.title: What do you like to do in a server?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Alright, I don’t support the “Have a teleport to everything in the spell panel” kinda thing, so where do you recommend I spawn NPC’s, and what kind, I’m stumped on that…

item.title: What do you like to do in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’m a skiller through and through, especially fletching, woodcutting and runecrafting.

100% RuneCrafting would be extremely nice in a server, working talismans and what not.

Read full topic
